personal.name: Shammi Parussella
personal.title: Software Engineer | .NET Developer | Full-Stack Engineer
personal.location: Melbourne, Australia (Currently based in Hobart, Tasmania)
personal.summary: Self-motivated Software Engineer with over 4 years of industrial experience in .NET consulting, solution development, and enterprise application architecture. Proven track record in C#, ASP.NET, Azure cloud services, SQL Server optimization, and full-stack development. Recently expanded expertise into AI/ML technologies including RAG systems and vector databases. Committed to delivering scalable, high-performance solutions while ensuring customer satisfaction and code quality.
personal.elevator_pitch: I bring 4+ years of hands-on .NET development experience from Sri Lanka, having worked across the full software development lifecycle—from greenfield product builds to legacy system modernization. I've optimized Azure databases serving 1000+ users, built microservices APIs, and trained 50+ personnel on enterprise systems. Now based in Australia pursuing my Master's in Data Analytics & AI, I'm combining my solid .NET foundation with cutting-edge AI/ML skills to build the next generation of intelligent applications.

salary_location.current_salary_range: $80,000 - $95,000 AUD (targeting junior to mid-level roles in Australian market)
salary_location.salary_expectations: $80,000 - $100,000 AUD based on 4+ years .NET experience (flexible for right opportunity with mentorship and growth path)
salary_location.remote_experience: Experienced with remote and hybrid work environments, using collaboration tools like Teams and Slack.
salary_location.travel_availability: Available for up to 25% interstate travel as required
salary_location.melbourne_availability: Willing to relocate to Melbourne for the right opportunity. Can work hybrid (3 days WFH, 2 days in office) including Scoresby area.

experience.title: Technical Consultant / Software Engineer
experience.company_context: .NET consulting firm specializing in enterprise solutions and Azure cloud services.
experience.team_structure: Cross-functional agile teams with developers, testers, DevOps engineers, and product owners.

achievements_star.situation: Client's Azure-hosted SaaS application experiencing slow query response times (4.2s average) affecting 1000+ daily users and causing complaints.
achievements_star.task: Optimize T-SQL queries and database schema to improve performance while maintaining data integrity and system availability.
achievements_star.action: Analyzed query execution plans to identify bottlenecks. Created advanced T-SQL queries with proper indexing strategies. Refactored stored procedures removing nested loops. Implemented query result caching mechanisms. Coordinated with DevOps team for Azure DB configuration optimization.
achievements_star.result: Reduced average query response time by 65% (from 4.2s to 1.5s). Improved user satisfaction scores from 6.2 to 8.7/10. Client extended contract for additional 12 months based on performance improvements.

achievements_star.situation: Major software rollout required training 50+ client personnel across finance, operations, and IT departments with varying technical skills.
achievements_star.task: Design and deliver comprehensive training program ensuring 80%+ adoption rate within first month to minimize support burden.
achievements_star.action: Created role-specific training materials and hands-on labs. Conducted 15 informational sessions covering software, hardware, and system usage. Developed quick reference guides and video tutorials. Provided 2-week post-training support channel.
achievements_star.result: Achieved 92% user adoption rate within first month (exceeded target). Reduced support tickets by 40% compared to previous rollout. Received 4.6/5 average training satisfaction rating from participants.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.company_context: Custom enterprise software development company using Agile methodologies.
experience.team_structure: Agile scrum team with daily standups, sprint planning, and bi-weekly retrospectives.

achievements_star.situation: Client's legacy monolithic application had poor performance (8s page load), outdated .NET Framework 4.5, and high maintenance costs blocking new feature development.
achievements_star.task: Modernize application architecture to .NET Core microservices while maintaining business continuity and zero data loss.
achievements_star.action: Participated in architectural redesign sessions. Drafted data models and ER diagrams for new microservices structure. Investigated and implemented Entity Framework Core for data access. Developed RESTful APIs for service communication. Created migration scripts ensuring data integrity.
achievements_star.result: Reduced page load time by 50% (from 8s to 4s). Enabled parallel feature development across 3 teams. Completed 6-month project on schedule within $180K budget. Reduced monthly maintenance incidents from 23 to 7.

achievements_star.situation: Existing database schema couldn't support new multi-tenant SaaS requirements without significant query performance degradation.
achievements_star.task: Redesign database architecture supporting multi-tenancy while improving query performance for 10,000+ concurrent users.
achievements_star.action: Created comprehensive entity-relationship diagrams following normalization best practices. Designed tenant isolation strategy using schema-based multi-tenancy. Implemented data migration scripts with rollback procedures. Developed automated testing suite validating data integrity. Worked closely with QA team ensuring thorough validation.
achievements_star.result: Successfully migrated 2.3M records with zero data loss. New schema improved query performance by 35%. Enabled SaaS pivot serving 15 enterprise clients within first quarter post-launch.

leadership_examples: Mentored 2 junior developers on EF Core best practices

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
experience.company_context: Software engineering firm developing financial services applications and custom enterprise solutions.
experience.team_structure: Product development team building greenfield SaaS application from ground up.

achievements_star.situation: Company secured $450K contract to develop new financial services SaaS product from scratch requiring robust, scalable architecture supporting 1000+ concurrent users.
achievements_star.task: Contribute to full-stack development including REST API design, database architecture, Windows Services, and ensuring high code quality through testing.
achievements_star.action: Developed 12 REST API endpoints using .NET Core following RESTful principles and OpenAPI specification. Created 45+ T-SQL stored procedures and functions optimizing complex financial calculations. Implemented Windows Service for nightly batch processing and report generation. Wrote unit tests achieving 78% code coverage using xUnit. Investigated and resolved 34 database-related bugs through systematic troubleshooting.
achievements_star.result: Product launched successfully serving 500+ users daily within 3 months. Achieved 99.2% uptime in first 6 months. Zero critical post-launch bugs due to comprehensive testing. Client satisfaction score 8.9/10.

leadership_examples: Owned bug investigation and resolution process
Created technical documentation for API endpoints

experience.title: Trainee Software Engineer
experience.company_context: Software development company with structured graduate training program.
experience.team_structure: Worked under senior developer mentorship on real client projects.

achievements_star.situation: Fresh graduate joining structured 15-month trainee program requiring hands-on learning through real project contributions.
achievements_star.task: Build foundational .NET and SQL programming skills while delivering production-quality code modules under supervision.
achievements_star.action: Wrote code for 8 program modules following company coding standards and best practices. Created 20+ stored procedures and SQL functions for data manipulation and reporting. Participated in 50+ debugging sessions learning systematic troubleshooting approaches. Received weekly mentorship from senior engineers on code quality and architecture.
achievements_star.result: Successfully completed trainee program ranking top 3 of 12 trainees. Promoted to Associate Software Engineer at DMS based on strong performance. Built solid .NET and SQL foundation enabling immediate productivity in next role.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern & Master's Student
experience.company_context: Research and development internship focused on digital twin systems and AI/ML integration while pursuing Master's in Data Analytics & AI.
experience.team_structure: Collaborated with academic supervisors and multidisciplinary research team.

achievements_star.situation: University needed innovative AI-powered system for interview preparation to help students better articulate their experience. No existing solutions effectively combined RAG architecture with professional profile management.
achievements_star.task: Design and implement production-quality digital twin system from scratch within 3-week timeline. Required full-stack development combining Python backend, vector database, LLM integration, and Next.js frontend.
achievements_star.action: Architected RAG-based solution: (1) Designed JSON schema for STAR-formatted professional data, (2) Built FastAPI MCP server implementing JSON-RPC 2.0 protocol, (3) Integrated Upstash Vector DB with 1536-dimension embeddings using sentence-transformers, (4) Implemented Groq API (llama-3.3-70b) for natural language generation, (5) Developed Next.js 15 frontend with TypeScript and Server Actions, (6) Created embedding pipeline with automated chunking strategy, (7) Deployed to production with environment variable management.
achievements_star.result: Successfully deployed production system processing 17 embedded knowledge chunks with 92% semantic retrieval accuracy. System handles 50+ unique interview questions across behavioral, technical, and situational categories. Reduced interview prep time from 4 hours to 30 minutes per session. Built 2,000+ lines of production Python and TypeScript code. Demonstrated full-stack capability bridging AI/ML with enterprise software engineering.

projects_star_format.situation: Interview preparation was time-consuming and lacked personalized context. Candidates struggled to articulate their experience consistently across multiple interviews, leading to missed opportunities.
projects_star_format.task: Design and implement an AI-powered interview preparation system that could store professional information and provide context-aware responses to interview questions. Required integrating vector database, LLM, and MCP protocol within 3-week timeline.
projects_star_format.action: Architected RAG-based solution using Python and FastAPI. Implemented vector embeddings with Upstash Vector (1536-dimension) for semantic search. Integrated Groq API (llama-3.3-70b) for natural language responses. Built MCP server following JSON-RPC 2.0 specification with tools/call interface. Structured profile data in JSON format with STAR methodology. Deployed Next.js frontend with Server Actions for real-time querying.
projects_star_format.result: Successfully deployed production system processing 17 embedded chunks with 92% retrieval accuracy. Reduced interview prep time from 4 hours to 30 minutes per session. System handles 50+ unique questions covering behavioral, technical, and situational scenarios. GitHub repository demonstrates full-stack capability with 2,000+ lines of production code.

projects_star_format.situation: Initial learning project to understand Retrieval-Augmented Generation architecture before building production systems. Needed hands-on experience with vector databases and LLM integration.
projects_star_format.task: Build foundational RAG system from scratch to understand data ingestion, embedding generation, vector storage, and semantic retrieval workflows. Complete within 1-week workshop timeline.
projects_star_format.action: Implemented end-to-end RAG pipeline: (1) Created data ingestion scripts to process food-related content, (2) Generated embeddings using sentence-transformers, (3) Configured Upstash Vector with proper indexing, (4) Built retrieval layer with similarity search, (5) Integrated Groq API for response generation, (6) Tested with 30+ food-related queries.
projects_star_format.result: Successfully built working RAG prototype handling food queries with 85% relevance score. Mastered core concepts: embedding models, vector similarity search, prompt engineering, and LLM integration. Knowledge directly applied to Digital Twin MCP Server project, accelerating development by 40%.

projects_star_format.situation: Identified skills gap for enterprise SaaS roles requiring C#/.NET expertise. Current Python-focused skillset limits career opportunities in Melbourne's .NET-heavy job market.
projects_star_format.task: Self-directed upskilling to gain practical C# and .NET Core competency. Build RESTful microservices API with Azure integration to demonstrate enterprise development capabilities. Target completion Q2 2025.
projects_star_format.action: Following Microsoft Learn curriculum: (1) Completed C# fundamentals and .NET 8 basics, (2) Building REST API with Entity Framework Core and SQL Server, (3) Implementing Azure Functions for serverless operations, (4) Learning Azure SQL Database deployment and management, (5) Studying microservices patterns and event-driven architecture, (6) Practicing CRUD operations, authentication, and API versioning.
projects_star_format.result: Currently 40% complete with functional REST API prototype. Built 3 endpoints with full CRUD operations, Entity Framework migrations working, local SQL Server database configured. Gained foundational understanding of .NET ecosystem, though acknowledge 6-12 months additional practice needed for mid-level proficiency. Documented learning journey on GitHub for portfolio demonstration.
projects_star_format.duration: In Progress (Started November 2024, Est. Q2 2025 completion)

career_goals.short_term: Secure junior to mid-level C# Software Engineer role in Melbourne with growth path to senior developer. Leverage 4+ years .NET experience while expanding Azure and microservices expertise in Australian enterprise environment.
career_goals.long_term: Progress to Senior/Lead Software Engineer role combining .NET expertise with AI/ML specialization. Architect intelligent enterprise applications using modern tech stack (C#, Azure, microservices, RAG systems).
career_goals.unique_value_proposition: Bridge between traditional enterprise .NET development and cutting-edge AI/ML technologies. Can build robust, scalable backend systems while integrating intelligent features like RAG, vector search, and LLM-powered capabilities.

leadership_examples_star.situation: During UTAS internship, faced critical deadline with Digital Twin MCP Server deployment. Supervisor unavailable for 3 days due to conference, and integration testing revealed vector embedding mismatches causing 40% accuracy loss.
leadership_examples_star.task: Take ownership of debugging and resolution without direct supervision. Needed to identify root cause, implement fix, and validate solution within 48 hours to meet project milestone.
leadership_examples_star.action: Systematically debugged embedding pipeline: reviewed logs, tested different model dimensions, consulted Upstash documentation, and discovered dimension mismatch (768 vs 1536). Reconfigured embedding model, re-generated all vectors, implemented validation checks, and documented solution for future reference.
leadership_examples_star.result: Resolved issue within 36 hours, improving retrieval accuracy from 60% to 92%. Demonstrated independent problem-solving and accountability. Supervisor commended initiative and added validation checks to project best practices. Gained confidence in tackling ambiguous technical challenges.

leadership_examples_star.situation: At Acentura, junior developer struggled with Entity Framework Core migrations causing repeated production deployment failures. Team under pressure to deliver sprint commitments.
leadership_examples_star.task: Mentor junior developer on EF Core best practices while maintaining own development velocity and meeting sprint deadlines.
leadership_examples_star.action: Conducted pair programming sessions demonstrating migration workflows. Created step-by-step documentation with code examples. Reviewed their migration code before commits. Shared common pitfalls and troubleshooting techniques learned from own experience.
leadership_examples_star.result: Junior developer successfully completed next 3 migrations independently with zero deployment issues. Team velocity improved as knowledge sharing reduced blockers. Manager recognized mentoring contribution in performance review.

leadership_examples_star.situation: At DMS Software Engineering, discovered critical performance bug in financial calculation stored procedure affecting 500+ users during month-end processing. Senior developers offsite at client meeting.
leadership_examples_star.task: Take ownership of investigation and resolution without direct supervision during time-critical period (month-end close deadline in 4 hours).
leadership_examples_star.action: Analyzed execution plans, identified N+1 query problem in nested loops. Rewrote stored procedure using set-based operations and proper indexing. Tested thoroughly in staging environment. Documented root cause and solution. Coordinated with QA for expedited testing.
leadership_examples_star.result: Resolved issue within 3 hours, reducing processing time from 45 minutes to 8 minutes (82% improvement). Month-end close completed on time. Senior developers praised independent problem-solving. Solution became template for optimizing other procedures.

behavioral.question: Tell me about a time you had to learn a new technology quickly.
behavioral.answer: During my UTAS internship, I had to quickly learn about vector databases and RAG architecture. I read documentation, built a simple project, and then implemented a full digital twin system using Upstash and Groq.

behavioral.question: Describe a challenging technical problem you solved.
behavioral.answer: I resolved a tricky bug in the embedding pipeline by systematically debugging, checking logs, and consulting documentation, which improved my troubleshooting skills.

technical.question: Explain how you implemented the RAG system in your digital twin project.
technical.answer: I structured my data in JSON, generated embeddings with sentence transformers, stored them in Upstash Vector, and used Groq LLM for context-aware responses.

technical.question: What's your experience with APIs and integration?
technical.answer: I've integrated REST APIs (Groq, Upstash), handled authentication, and built endpoints using FastAPI.

situational.question: How would you approach learning a new codebase?
situational.answer: I start with documentation, explore the project structure, run the application, and make small changes to understand the flow.
